subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Reyes left Sunday’s game against the Braves with a stiff hamstring and Daniel Murphy was helped off with an injured knee. Then Chipper Jones singled in the winning run for Atlanta in the ninth.
snippet: Jose Reyes left Sunday’s game against the Braves with a stiff hamstring and Daniel Murphy was helped off with an injured knee. Then Chipper Jones singled in the winning run for Atlanta in the ninth.
